original: At 2:00 PM, Aster de Wyverngarde went to pay his respects at his father’s coffin. Unbeknownst to him, however, there was a Glyph of Contingency set to trap him inside a Force Cage. The trap triggered and Aster was trapped in that magical cage for its duration. Aster attempted to break the Force Cage by casting Fire Bolt. This created fresh traces of evocation which makes it impossible to tell when the Glyph of Contingency was placed.\n\nThere were traces of illusion magic at the crime scene. This might imply that someone hid themselves from the guards as they set this trap.
translation: 下午2:00，阿斯特·维文加德在父亲遗棺前悼念。但他并不知道，那里设下了附加坚牢术的有备无患法术。陷阱被触发后，阿斯特在法术生效期间一直被关在魔法牢笼内。阿斯特曾尝试用火焰箭破坏坚牢术，也因此留下了塑能魔法的痕迹，导致有备无患法术的具体位置难以确定。\n\n犯罪现场留有幻觉魔法的痕迹。可能意味着设下陷阱的人曾尝试躲避守卫。
